meta.notes: Single source of truth for campaign clocks. Added Oskern personal/threat/goal clocks.

civil_war_endgame.note: Ticks when holds fall or decisive victories happen.

thalmor_influence.note: Ticks on atrocities, sabotage, and Dominion manipulation.

act_04_siege_preparation.note: Tracks final siege prep toward Solitude/Windhelm.

act_05_true_enemy.note: Tracks direct confrontation with Thalmor endgame.

thieves_guild_restoration.note: Side Plot C — Shadows of the Rift.

dark_brotherhood_emperor_plot.note: Side Plot C — assassination lane intersects the war.

college_eye_of_magnus.note: Side Plot C — arcane crisis and political fallout.

companions_harbinger.note: Side Plot C — honor vs wartime brutality.

thalmor_shadow_war.note: Side Plot C — covert operations escalating into Act V.

stormcloak_trust.note: Oskern standing with the Sons of Skyrim. Ticks on missions/sacrifices for the cause. MAX = promotion + war council access + call-in aid 1/session.

silver_hand_retaliation.note: Threat clock for Silver Hand counter-hunts aimed at Oskern. Ticks as they learn, mobilize, and set traps. MAX = major strike (ambush/raid/exposure).

way_of_the_voice_offshoot.note: Custom faction — Greybeards-adjacent splinter. Ticks on voice-lore, restraint, mentorship. MAX = unlock mentor/word/technique upgrade.

hircines_call_oskern.note: How deeply Oskern is claimed by the Hunt. Ticks on rites, trophies, compels accepted. MAX = Hircine escalation/trial + major upgrade.

beast_mastery_oskern.note: Control during/after transformation. Ticks on resisting frenzy and maintaining intent. MAX = first-shift control becomes reliable.

unleashed_pup.note: The infected Silver Hand survivor ripple. Ticks as they survive/change/spread. MAX = named NPC + big complication.

path_to_hircines_champion.note: Long-arc: become Hircine’s Champion. MAX = mantle offered (with price).

liberate_falkreath_hold.note: Long-arc: free Falkreath from corruption/Imperial leverage. MAX = hold flips / Siddgeir falls.

claim_the_jarlship_falkreath.note: Long-arc ambition: take the Jarlship. MAX = you can credibly seize rule and endure fallout.
